user_request: see creations saved in the google photos
screen_desc: The screenshot shows a mobile interface for searching photos, specifically within Google Photos. It displays a few categories for media, such as "Videos," "Movies," "Animations," and "Collages." The user can tap on each category to filter their photos by type. There is also an option to see more categories, indicated by the "Show more" link.
history_actions: click on the Photos app located at the upper left.
click on the "Confirm" button located at the bottom of screen.
click on the menu icon (often represented by three horizontal lines, also known as the "hamburger" icon) located at the top left.
click on the "Settings" located at the middle left.
click on the back button "<-" located at the top-left.
click on the "Search your photos" bar located at the top.
action_plan: Click on the 'Movies' category to view any saved video creations.
If needed, click on 'Animations' or 'Collages' to explore other types of creations.

action_with_memory.Next Single Step Action: Click on the 'Movies' category to view any saved video creations.
